contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|over the edge}} '''Over the Edge''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Film, radio, television, and theatre== * [[Over the Edge (film)|''Over the Edge'' (film)]], a 1979 drama starring Matt Dillon * [[Over the Edge (radio)|''Over the Edge'' (radio)]], a radio program created by Don Joyce of the experimental band Negativland ** [[Over the Edge (album series)]], a series of CDs edited from the radio program * [[Over the Edge (Zimbabwe)]], a Zimbabwean theatre company * ''[[WWF Over the Edge]]'', a professional wrestling pay-per-view event series **''[[Over the Edge: In Your House]]'', the 1998 event **[[Over the Edge (1999)|''Over the Edge'' (1999)]] * "Over the Edge", an [[List of Batman animated episodes#The New Batman Adventures Season Two (1998-1999)|episode of ''The New Batman Adventures'']] ==Literature== * [[Over the Edge (anthology)|''Over the Edge'' (anthology)]], edited by August Derleth * [[Over the Edge (book)|''Over the Edge'' (book)]], a nonfiction book by Greg Child * [[Over the Edge (Jonathan Kellerman novel)|''Over the Edge'' (Jonathan Kellerman novel)]], an Alex Delaware novel by Jonathan Kellerman * [[Over the Edge (short stories)|''Over the Edge'' (short stories)]], a story collection by [[Harlan Ellison]] * ''Over the Edge'', a student newspaper at the [[University of Northern British Columbia#Student media|University of Northern British Columbia]] ==Music== * [[Over the Edge (Mickey Thomas album)|''Over the Edge'' (Mickey Thomas album)]] * [[Over the Edge (Wipers album)|''Over the Edge'' (Wipers album)]] * ''Over the Edge'', an album by [[Hurricane (band)|Hurricane]] * "Over the Edge", a song by Armored Saint from ''[[Delirious Nomad]]'' * "Over the Edge", a song by Fu Manchu from ''[[King of the Road (Fu Manchu album)|King of the Road]]'' * "Over the Edge", a song by L.A. Guns from ''[[Hollywood Vampires]]'' * "Over the Edge", a song by Ratt from ''[[Ratt (album)|Ratt]]'' * "Over the Edge", a song by Status Quo from ''[[Just Supposin']]'' ==Other uses== * [[Over the Edge (game)|''Over the Edge'' (game)]], a role-playing game ==See also== * [[Over the Hedge (disambiguation)]], a comic strip and related media * [[The Edge (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
